properties.name: text
properties.sample: Minus repudiandae deleniti fuga sit. Iure cupiditate quod illo non. Quasi blanditiis explicabo inventore modi laborum praesentium laboriosam.

multipleTypes.sample: A film that chronicles the events of the Hindenburg disaster in which a zeppelin burst into flames.

This film is a compendium of the facts and fiction of the events leading up to the disaster. For dramatic effect, Sabotage was chosen as the cause, rather than electricity lashing out at a couple of tons of hydrogen.

properties.name: text
properties.sample: Nominated for 3 Oscars. Another 2 wins & 1 nomination.

multipleTypes.sample: Visually compelling but narratively barren, Young Ones adds little to the dystopian Western genre.
